questions.quote: Hey! Kramer come on in. You've got to watch this, now she's got nothing.
So, set it up. You know what, we could have dinner at the Friars Club.
Well, let me. Heh. Let me just eh.. check an', make sure I have the right man--ha! Heh, heh, heh! Seems--oh! I, oh!
Hello. Oh! Hi George.......What! ..really! All right I'll call Elaine , we'll meet you down there.
Uromycitisis! I wonder if they're having any trouble controlling themselves during this trial? Perhaps these two hooligans would like to have a pee party right here in the courtroom!
Well Susan isn't going and Elaine just left me a message her friend isn't going either.
I don't want hope. Hope is killing me. My dream is to become hopeless. When you're hopeless, you don't care, and when you don't care, that indifference makes you attractive.
Yeah. No. Listen, George, I am quite certain I'm walking out of there with a bowl of soup.
Jerry, he wants me to run the catalog! It's crazy! I can't be in charge!
No you can't.  Now let's cut the ball, sister! You think I don't know about you swapping spit with somebody yesterday on Columbus Avenue?
